resources.string: Eu li e aceitei os Termos de Serviço e Política de Privacidade
A Galeria permite gerir, optimizar e editar fotos e vídeos no seu dispositivo, assim como, sincronizá-los na Xiaomi Cloud
Esta aplicação permite instalar aplicações de terceiros, analisá-las antes da instalação e dar recomendações após
You can use this app for calculations, converting units and currencies, and estimating your mortgage repayments.
You can use Camera to take photos and shoot videos.

"In order to provide you with better services, your device may periodically send your device version information, device identification data (including IMEI/IMSI/MSISDN/MAC address, MEID/ICCID), and approximate location information (including base station ID) to the carrier via Wi-Fi, mobile data network, or free SMS. The carrier promises to analyze relevant information only to improve the quality of services or to provide customized services or technologies, and won't disclose relevant information to third parties in any form that identifies you personally. The specific carrier statement shall prevail. Consult your carrier regarding the cost of using this service."
You can use this app to view time, as well as use timer, world clock, stopwatch, set alarms, and more.
You can choose turn off location access in Settings > Additional settings > Privacy or restrict permissions for individual apps in Security.

"In order to improve the services provided to you, the mobile network operator of your choice may upload your personal data and the info about this device to its servers using Wi-Fi networks or mobile data connection. This information will only be used for statistical purposes in order to improve the quality of the services and provide more personalized content. This information won't be used to identify you personally and won't be disclosed to third parties."
You can use this app for navigation, as well as viewing coordinates, atmospheric pressure, and altitude.
Deslize para cima para entrar no sistema
Content Center aggregates content and services from multiple channels. Here you can read articles, watch videos, view daily featured items, and receive content recommendations.
Mantenha premido dois dedos para activar a acessibilidade

Send diagnostic data to locate and analyze system issues and improve user experience. Such data may include personal information (e.g. IP, location, etc.)

This app manages all your downloads, including those done in GetApps, Mi Video, Updater, Themes, and Browser.
Ligou o TalkBack ao premir o ecrã com 2 dedos por mais de 10 segundos. O TalkBack fornece uma voz para pessoas invisuais. Se o ligou por acidente, toque no botao Cancelar e depois duplo toque no ecrã
Quick apps Framework allows you to create and provide services in quick apps.
Mi Services Framework allows you to use Mi Account, Mi Push, Mi Stats, and MIUI BI.

To provide you with these services, Mi Services Framework (MiAccount, Mi Push, Mi Stats, MIUI BI) needs to connect to the internet, access your phone number, IMEI, and IMSI, and allow your device to receive push notifications
Games plug-in allows you to sign in, create orders, complete payments, use coupons, and participate in promotion events.

To be able to work normally, Google Play needs to connect to the internet, access your location, be able to record audio, make calls, access calendar events, call history, sensors, storage, camera, device info, and accounts.

Location-based services find products and services near you.
Wallpaper Carousel allows you to get fresh images delivered to your Lock screen daily.

"Após desligar esta funcionalidade, não vai mais receber anúncios personalizados. Vai continuar a receber anúncios irrelevantes para si. Pode saber mais na Política de Privacidade da Xiaomi. Desligar os anúncios personalizados mesmo assim?"
Personalizar anúncios com base nos seus interesses

For accessing storage in order to parse and scan installation packages
For accessing call history in order to display blocked items

For accessing IMEI to provide services associated with your device
For saving photos and videos on device

For accessing IMEI in order to identify devices
For accessing network type in order to optimize and adjust downloadable items
Access phone number, IMEI, and IMSI:

For taking photos, recording videos, and using flash
For saving, editing, and syncing photos and videos
For adding items to call history and deleting blocked calls
Access and save files and photos on your device:

For accessing and saving audio recordings
For recording audio while recording video
For accessing and saving screen recordings
For performing virus scan and optimizing your device
For signing in and managing system accounts in order to provide Xunlei services

"Read our User Agreement and Privacy Policy to understand what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices are available to you. You must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you can use MIUI. %s and Mi Account components will connect to the internet and acquire your location."
Mi services, Mi SIM activation services, Xiaomi Cloud, Find device, Home screen, Games, MIUI Daemon, MSA system components, translation services, Quick apps, App vault, statistics, Mi Link

"
You must agree to Facemoji Privacy Policy before using this feature."

Before using MIUI, you must read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy. While your device is being activated, Mi SIM Activation Service, Home screen, Frequent phrases, Translation Service, MIUI Daemon, and Updater will connect to the network. MSA will connect to the network and access your location.
"You'll be able to use Mi AI in these cases: 1. When the screen is on. 2. When you're listening to music with your screen off."
Diga \"Mi AI\" para o seu telefone. Mi AI vai reconhecer a sua voz e vai poder controlar o seu dispositivo
